BITS Pilani: Birla Institute of Technology & Science, Pilani (BITS Pilani) is a deemed university in Pilani, Rajasthan, India.[12] It focuses primarily on higher education and research in engineering and sciences.[13] BITS Pilani is one of the first six institutes in India to be granted Institute of Eminence status.[14] According to 2012 data, BITS Pilani has an acceptance rate of 1.47%, making it one of the most exclusive technical universities in the world.[15][16]
